sendcrock.text: Dear @,^Remember the whole family used to make kimchi during the winter back home? ^I'm sending you this crock so you can make delicious kimchi!^ -Mom
sendcrock2.text: Dear @,^Remember the whole family used to make kimchi during the winter back home? ^I'm sending you this crock so you can make delicious kimchi!^ -Dad
sendPottery1.text: Dear @,^To prepare for wintering, you will need some good pottery.^Pickle vegetables and fish with salt and fruits with honey.^ -Mom
sendPottery2.text: Dear @,^I have a lot of good DoenJang, so send it to you.^Pickling vegetables would be great.^ -Mom
sendPottery3.text: Dear @,^I have a lot of good GochuJang, so send it to you.^Pickling vegetables, fruits or made Yangnyeom Gejang would be great.^ -Dad
sendPottery4.text: Dear @,^I have a lot of good Soy Sauce, so send it to you.^Pickling vegetables, fruits or made Ganjang Gejang, Ganjang Shrimp would be great.^ -Dad
sendPottery5.text: Dear @,^Did you like oil pickle what you ate when you traveled abroad?^Learn how to make and send it to you, so make it once.^ -Mom
sendPottery6.text: Dear @,^There are a lot of fresh ingredients on your farm?^If you make soak soju, it will definitely sell very well.^ -Dad
